TextView.android:text: If selected for employment are you willing to submit to a pre-employment drug screening test?
Have you ever been convicted of a felony?
Other trainings, certifications or licenses held:

CheckBox.android:text: I certify that all answers given herein are true and complete to ther best of my knowledge.
I authorize investigation of all statements contained in this application for employment as may be necessary in arriving at an employment decision.
In the even of employment, I understand that false or misleading information given in my application or interview(s) may result in discharge.
